ee kumakda yath, ´´aanandaya, dan wanahi ma wisin pihituwana lada me yahapath pawathuma wanahi eekanthayen kalakirima pinisa, noalima pinisa, bhawa nirodhaya pinisa, keles sansindima pinisa, wishesha nyanaya pinisa, awabodhaya pinisa, nirwanaya pinasa pawathi. ´´aanandaya, dan wanahi ma wisin pihituwanalada eekanthayen kalakirima pinasa, noalima pinisa, bhawa nirodhaya pinisa, keles sansindima pinisa, wishesha gnyanaya pinisa, awabodhaya pinisa, nirwanaya pinisa pawathina ee yahapath pawathuma kawareda? ´´me angga atak athi aayrya marga, enam, yahapath dakima, yahapath kalpanawa, yahapath wachanaya, yahapath karmanthaya, yahapath jiwikawa, yahapath uthsahaya, yahapath sihiya, yahapath samadhiya yana mowuhuya. ´´aanandaya, dan ma wisin pihituwana lada me yahapath pawathuma eekanthayen kalakirima pinisa, noalima pinisa, bhawa nirodhaya pinisa, keles sansindima pinasa, wishesha gnyanaya pinisa, awabodhaya pinisa, nirwanaya pinasa pawathiyi. ´´aanandaya, mama wanahi numbaata mese kiyami.

ee thamayi ape pasal aadaraya ee aadaraya windiddi samaharunta thamange amma thaththa amathaka wuna ee ayata waraduna thana ethana kohemin kohoma hari api loku wuna pasalen yanna wuna eelangata apita thibune lokuma prashnaya rakiyawak karana eka sapela asamath wunu godak dena hamudawata giya ee kale yuddeth thibuna samaharu gamant ekakata giya me athare api usas pela karala job hoyanawa samaharu kampas giya samaharu kampas yanna bari hinda lakunu madi nisa bahira upadhi kala me hama ekakma karala api anthimata nawathinne rakiyawak hoyagena habayi api ee rakiyawa karanna patan ganiddi sapela asamath wela ee dawaswalama rakiya karapu aya apita wada honda thanakata awith hitiya me athare api pasale patan gaththu ee aadaraya samahara aya ee widihatama thiya gaththa thawath samaharunge aadaraya bondawela giya api kellekge passen wath kellek kollekge passenwath yanna aluth aadarayak hoyanna api dan pelabenawa ee aadarayath ekka yaddi prashna mathuwela aadaraya bondawela yaddi apita danena dukath ekka apita mulu loketama ahenna kagahala andanna ona wuna thaniyen kalpana kara habayi ee dala giya aadaraya aye apita awe nathi wunata apita thibuna duka apiwa dala giye na neda me hama dema athare thamange ammage thaththage aadaraya apiwa dala giye na mona prashne aawath eyala apith ekka hitiya namuth apita eeka notheruna thaththa apita eyage aadaraya pennuwe na namuth eya api diha baluwa api jiwath wenne kohomada kiyala eya baluwa apita eeka penune na danune na meka thamayi thaththage aadaraya namuth api ee aadaraya diha baluwe na api hithuwe eya apita aadare na kiyala ehema neda ?
samaharu binduwen beduwahama uththaraya ananthayayi kiyala salakanawa.
